statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={4.4}, \displaystyle{b}={6.2}, \displaystyle{c}={7.2}, and \displaystyle{d}={8.9} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={115}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
